data.name: Nadia Was Here - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy more rpg goodness on your favorite music player for free! :)
The soundtrack features over 50 tracks by Joep Aben in .mp3 format. The soundtrack also includes 3 remixes by Delfo "Pinteezy" Pinto which were created for the trailers of Nadia was Here.

Downloaded the soundtrack? You can find it in the same folder as the base game 'Nadia was Here'. Find Nadia was Here in your Steam library, right mouse button and select 'local files'. You will be directed to the right folder.

data.short_description: Enjoy more rpg goodness on your favorite music player for free! :) The soundtrack features over 50 tracks by Joep Aben in .mp3 format. The soundtrack also includes 3 remixes by Delfo Pinto which are created for the trailers of Nadia was Here.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: 1.2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 408 MB available space
